tool.name: tool_0

param.name: GEOREF
param.dialogReference:
Geo-Reference

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] corner

[1] center

Default: 0

The grids geo-reference must be related either to the center or the corner of its lower left grid cell.

param.name: PREC
param.dialogReference:
ASCII Precision

Integer

Minimum: -1

Default: 4

Number of decimals when writing floating point values in ASCII format.

param.name: DECSEP
param.dialogReference:
ASCII Decimal Separator

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] point (.)

[1] comma (,)

Default: 0

Applies also to the binary format header file.

tool.summary: Export grid to ESRI's Arc/Info grid format.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
